titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1994) to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the removal or demotion of employees of the Department of Veterans Affairs based on performance or misconduct, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3236) to provide an extension of Federal-aid highway, highway safety, motor carrier safety, transit, and other programs funded out of the Highway Trust Fund, to provide resource flexibility to the Department of Veterans Affairs for health care services, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-234, by Mr. Sessions.

All points of order against consideration of the bills are waived. For H.R. 1994, The committee amendment in the nature of a substitute shall be considered as read. No amendment will be in order except those printed in the report accompanying the resolution .

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 52.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 388.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 242 - 180 (Roll no. 483).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 183 (Roll no. 484).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/28/2015--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1994) to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the removal or demotion of employees of the Department of Veterans Affairs based on performance or misconduct, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3236) to provide an extension of Federal-aid highway, highway safety, motor carrier safety, transit, and other programs funded out of the Highway Trust Fund, to provide resource flexibility to the Department of Veterans Affairs for health care services.
